charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 2113(d): UNLAWFULLY, WILFULLY, AND KNOWINGLY, BY FORCE AND INTIMIDATION, DID TAKE FROM THE PERSON AND PRESENCE OF ANOTHER MONEY BELONGING TO AND IN THE CARE, CUSTODY, CONTROL, MAMAGEMENT, AND POSSESSION OF THE FIRST BANK OF THE AMERICAS, LOCATED AT 845 THIRD AVENUE, NEW YORK, NEW YORK, A BANK, THE DEPOSITS OF WHICH WERE THEN INSURED BY THE FEDERAL DEPOSIT INSURANCE CORPORATION, AND IN COMMITTING AND ATTEMPTING TO COMMIT THE OFFENSE DESCRIBED ABOVE, DID ASSAULT AND PUT IN JEOPARDY THE LIVES OF SUCH PERSONS BY THE USE OF A DANGEROUS WEAPON, TO WIT, A HANDGUN.
